title: Resistors
guide:
### Color Code
| Color | Digit | Multiplier |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Black** | 0 | 1 |
| **Brown** | 1 | 10 |
| **Red** | 2 | 100 |
| **Orange**| 3 | 1k |
| **Yellow**| 4 | 10k |
| **Green** | 5 | 100k |
| **Blue** | 6 | 1M |
| **Violet**| 7 | 10M |
| **Grey** | 8 | 100M |
| **White** | 9 | 1G |

*Band 4 (Tolerance): Gold 5%.*
